revised_title: Thermodynamic Analysis of Direct Dye Adsorption on Cellulose
tldr: The authors present a thermodynamic analysis of direct dye adsorption on cellulose, providing a quantitative measure of affinity and explaining the effect of dye structure on adsorption. They also show that a conventional thermodynamic treatment yields all the relations derived by previous theories and accounts for discrepancies between experimental data and those theories.
